name: Save Ambar!
description:
When I saw the theme "hydrid" I automatically had an idea, mix the painted cardboard games we make with my daughter Ambar (4 years old). She constantly has crazy ideas for very complicated games with confusing rules and mechanics hehe. In this game I try to capture the spirit of those analog games and take them to a digital video game.

It is a way to show all the sacrifice that parents make to take care of our children and accompany them on their journey through life

To play in browser:  www.vamperro.org/web

Github: https://github.com/vamperro/GameOff2018
